name: nodejs-ssr-boilerplate
description: Bootstrap Project for frontend and backend

scripts.migrate: (cd server;npx prisma migrate dev --name init && npx prisma db seed)
scripts.start:local: concurrently "(cd server;npm run dev)" "(cd client;npm start)"
scripts.install: concurrently "(cd server;npm install)" "(cd client;npm install)" "(cd isomorphic;npm install)"
